design_philosophy.name: Swiss Medical Vitality
design_philosophy.description: A high-trust, functional design inspired by Swiss International Style. It prioritizes clarity, legibility, and action over decoration. It uses strict grids, flat colors, and bold typography to create a sense of reliability and modern efficiency without the 'tech startup' fluff.
core_principles: Function over Form: Every element serves the goal of driving a call or visit.
High Contrast & Legibility: Optimized for elderly eyes. No low-contrast grey text.
Flat & Bold: No shadows, no gradients. Depth is created via borders and spacing.
Local Trust: Uses imagery and language that feels like a neighborhood staple, not a faceless corporation.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients or shadows. Use borders and spacing.
Ensure all text is high contrast (Dark Grey #1F1F1F on White).
Use 'Outfit' font for all Headings (h1-h6) and 'DM Sans' for body.
Primary CTA (Call/WhatsApp) must be always visible or easily accessible.
Mobile First: Elements stack vertically on mobile with large touch targets.
No generic 'Lorem Ipsum' if possible. Use realistic drug store text.
Images must have 'alt' text for accessibility.
